Class Vector

java.lang.Object
Vector
public class Vector extends Object
Vectors. I initially created this class to hopefully make developing on Greenfoot easier, but it seems like it did the exact opposite than intended.
Version:
2024-02-27
Author:
Freeman Wang

    • limitMagnitude

      public Vector limitMagnitude(double magnitude)
      Returns a Vector with a magnitude that will not exceed the given magnitude. If the Vector's magnitude is less than the given magnitude, return the original Vector.
      Parameters:
      magnitude - The magnitude to limit to.
      Returns:
      This Vector, with magnitude limited to the given magnitude.

    • reverse

      public Vector reverse()
      Returns this Vector, but reversed.
